original_text: And whenever they saw that there was much money in the chest, the king's secretary and the high priest came up and they bagged and counted the money that was found in the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 이에 그 궤 가운데 은이 많은 것을 보면 왕의 서기와 대제사장이 올라와서 여호와의 성전에 있는 대로 그 은을 계산하여 봉하고

sentences.original_text: And whenever they saw that there was much money in the chest
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 궤에 돈이 많이 들어있는 것을 볼 때마다

sentences.original_text: the king's secretary and the high priest came up
and they bagged and counted the money
that was found in the house of the Lord.
